title: Living Without Money.pdf
description:
Is It Possible For Humans To Exist Without Money? Living Off The Grid, So to speak.

The people in this book have made this a reality. This also questions the role of 

our government in the taxation area in particular. 

Q: If you're living off the land and have no income, how can they tax you. 

A: They could(but won't) put you in a forced labor camp(like the one's in   
   Stalin's era) and make you work and then tax your income for the rest of your 
   life. But that would mean reverting to communism(what a paradox!).


   
            O man, naked you were born, naked you will return to it.
